description: This PHP source file renders a web page for adding a device to be blocked in a content control system. It includes header and utility scripts, inline CSS and JavaScript for user interaction and validation, and dynamically displays a list of known and custom devices to block with options for setting blocking time and days.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves string parameters based on key, used for obtaining configuration flags.

methods.name: getInstanceIDs
methods.description: Fetches list of instance IDs for certain device or host objects from the underlying data model.

methods.name: getParaValues
methods.description: Gets parameter values for specified instance objects, used here to list known devices.
